title: Alolan Raichu

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Thunder Punch: Choose one player to attack with a thunder punch. The impact is so large that it roleblocks their neighbors on the player list, but Pokemon players are immune. (âˆž uses)
- Disarming Voice: Disable all attacks targeting Pokemembers until the end of the next night. (2 uses)
- Encore: Use one of the abilities from **Pichu** or **Pikachu**. (2 uses)
- Quick Attack: Attack a player during the day. This attack resolves immediately. (1 use)
- Shock Wave: Redirect three players to a player of your choice. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Agility: You're capable of multitasking as long as you have enough uses.
- Concept of Evolution: Your attack value will be whatever your attack value was as **Pikachu** when you evolved.
- Surge Surfer: You'll levitate over the first attack that targets you every night. You can only be killed by an attack if you're attacked twice or more in the same night.
- This role can't spawn unless it's evolved from **Pikachu**.

desc:
Post 2302
*The alolan variant of Raichu, who levitates on it's own tail.*
